feed.title: Calibre-Web Companion Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Calibre-Web Companion: Release v1.2.0
entry.content:
Changelog:

  • added integration for calibre web automated book downloader
  • you can now send ebooks to your kindle via email
  • you can now mark books as read / unread
  • you can now toggle the archived status of a book
  • you can add and remove books from shelfs
  • changed namespace

Implemented Issues:

3

4

entry.title: New release for Calibre-Web Companion: Release v1.3.0
entry.content:
Changelog:

  • updated feedback when editing books
  • added shelf functionality (edit, delete, create)
  • updated loading indicators

  • fixed order by added date desc

  • Fixed #9: Default language is now English

  • Fixed #8: Book is now completely downloaded to device
  • Fixed #4: Books will now be added to shelf

entry.title: New release for Calibre-Web Companion: Release v1.3.1
entry.content:
Changelog:

  • updated package name
  • added icon to ios build
  • updated feature graphics in readme

entry.title: New release for Calibre-Web Companion: Release v1.4.0
entry.content:
Changelog:

  • support for costum headers
  • feedback dialog
  • edit book metadata #13
  • new page transitions
  • book archived toggle

Fixed: - #12

entry.title: New release for Calibre-Web Companion: Release v1.4.1
